message: Mink keeps one hand around my neck as the other gropes around my lower body.

name: ミンク
message: "Bend your knees."
I lift my legs like I'm told, making it easy for him to remove my clothes. He tears my pants and underwear off.
If I said I didn't feel humiliated... I'd be lying.
But the thrill is so much greater.
Mink feels around my entrance, still sore from his vicious assault yesterday, and my hips buck.
He places his hand under one of my thighs and lifts it up.
My heart begins to pound even harder.
Just the touch of air is enough to make it sting. I wonder how it will feel when he forces his way inside again...
Of course, I don't really need to wonder.
And yet, I don't even consider trying to escape.
In fact... I'm actually looking forward to it. This time, I'll learn what lies beyond the torment.
I'm going to fall into the depths of depravity, and allow myself to be carried off into bliss.
It's too late to turn back.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uuh, nmm... Ngh, eek, ah, ahhh...!"
Agony sears my body as Mink pushes himself inside me, tearing me apart.
My throat bulges beneath the hand around my neck while my fingernails scrape against the floor.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Eeep, ahh... Guh, ugh, ahh...!"
The pain rings in my ears, piercing my brain. It's rending, savage; I can taste the blood, though everything is happening between my legs.
And still, he keeps driving deeper, as if carving out a space to fit him, and him alone.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uuh, uuh.. Ahh... Uuh..."
It hurts so much that even my teeth are chattering.
But at the same time, there's another feeling, one that threatens to sweep me away.
And that feeling... is a pleasure so intense it terrifies me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hngh... Uuh, guh... Ah, gah...!"
Mink grabs my hips with one hand and starts to shake me back and forth.

name: ミンク
message: "Let me hear you scream."
He squeezes my neck tighter.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Egh, ahh, haa... Gahh... Ahh..."
Once again, I'm struggling for breath, but he doesn't let up. He thrusts even harder.
I want to scream, but I can't get the air. My nose is burning, tears streaming down my face, as I struggle to get out wheezes and moans.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh... Haah...!"

name: ミンク
message: "Does it hurt?"
Mink's voice sounds so close, yet so far away. I can barely make out the words.
My thoughts are growing dim as I struggle, my body going numb, the pain melting away.
And in that state, with Mink pounding away at me, I start to feel a strange, dizzying pleasure.
What is this...
It hurts so much, but it feels so good...
I cry out, joy in my voice.
He hasn't touched me there at all, yet I'm already fully erect and oozing.
But in the middle of it all, my consciousness starts to flicker.
My eyelids grow heavy, and my sensations―even the shortness of breath―start to fade.
The same thing happened yesterday.
He choked me and everything started to fade...
Today, it's too much... I can't go on...
But just before I lose consciousness, Mink loosens his grip on my neck once again.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Guh, uugh, gahh! Agh, gah, guh...!"
I immediately start coughing. Tears cover my face, but Mink doesn't let up.

name: 蒼葉
message: "U-Ugh... Ngh, guh, ah, gahh, ah, aaaah..."
Something is happening to me. I don't know what.
All I can do is surrender to the ecstasy coming from deep within.
After a bit, I start to feel like I'm drifting off again.
I can't even think... It's all so strange...
...And then the darkness takes me.
